repo_description: A project to test our project structure and try new things.

schemas.name: UserQuery.graphql
schemas.content:
"User Queries"
type Query {
  """
  Get a user
  """
  user(id: String!): User
  """
  Get a user
  """
  users: [User]
  """
  Get user credentials
  """
  login(email: String!, password: String!): AuthToken
}

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/sigalei/sigalei-stack/blob/fc98e4756151d59c1e009ea69241c444afd28b0f/api/src/graphql/user/query/UserQuery.graphql:
"User Queries"
type Query {
  """
  Get a user
  """
  user(id: String!): User
  """
  Get a user
  """
  users: [User]
  """
  Get user credentials
  """
  login(email: String!, password: String!): AuthToken
}

# https://github.com/sigalei/sigalei-stack/blob/fc98e4756151d59c1e009ea69241c444afd28b0f/api/src/graphql/user/types/User.graphql:
"""
User: represents a user
"""
type User {
  """
  User id
  """
  id: ID!
  """
  User email
  """
  email: String
  """
  User password
  """
  password: String
  """
  the user tasks
  """
  Tasks: [Task]
}

# https://github.com/sigalei/sigalei-stack/blob/fc98e4756151d59c1e009ea69241c444afd28b0f/api/src/graphql/user/types/AuthToken.graphql:
"""
AuthToken: represents a users authentication token
"""
type AuthToken {
  """
  Token
  """
  token: String!
  """
  User
  """
  user: User!
}

# https://github.com/sigalei/sigalei-stack/blob/fc98e4756151d59c1e009ea69241c444afd28b0f/api/src/graphql/task/types/Task.graphql:
"""
Task: represents a task
"""
type Task {
  """
  Task id
  """
  id: ID!
  """
  Task content
  """
  content: String
  """
  The completed status of a task
  """
  completed: Boolean
}

schemas.name: User.graphql
schemas.content:
"""
User: represents a user
"""
type User {
  """
  User id
  """
  id: ID!
  """
  User email
  """

  """
  User password

  """

schemas.name: schema.graphql
schemas.content:
"""AuthToken: represents a users authentication token"""
type AuthToken {
  """Token"""
  token: String!

  """User"""
  user: User!
}

"""Task mutations"""
type Mutation {
  """Sign up a new user"""
  signUp(email: String!, password: String!): User

  """Create a task"""
  createTask(content: String!, userId: String!): Task
}

"""Task queries"""
type Query {
  """Get a task"""
  task(id: String!): Task

  """Get a user"""
  user(id: String!): User

  """Get a user"""
  users: [User]

  """Get user credentials"""
  login(email: String!, password: String!): AuthToken
}

"""Task: represents a task"""
type Task {
  """Task id"""
  id: ID!

  """Task content"""
  content: String

  """The completed status of a task"""
  completed: Boolean
}

"""User: represents a user"""
type User {
  """User id"""
  id: ID!

  """User email"""
  email: String

  """User password"""
  password: String

  """the user tasks"""
  Tasks: [Task]
}
